description: This file contains utility functions for handling MessagePack data, including a helper for converting packed data into structures, and an internal finder function to locate specific keys within MessagePack maps. It includes license information, dependencies, and implementation of external functions and helper routines used in processing MessagePack data in DHCP Manager components.

methods.name: void * helper_convert(const void * buf,size_t len,size_t struct_size,const char * wrapper,msgpack_object_type expect_type,bool optional,process_fn_t process,destroy_fn_t destroy)
methods.description: Converts a buffer containing MessagePack data into a structured object, handling optional wrappers and processing functions.

methods.name: msgpack_object * __finder(const char * name,msgpack_object_type expect_type,msgpack_object_map * map)
methods.description: Internal helper function that searches for a key of a specific type within a MessagePack map.

ctags.name: helper_convert
ctags.signature: (const void * buf,size_t len,size_t struct_size,const char * wrapper,msgpack_object_type expect_type,bool optional,process_fn_t process,destroy_fn_t destroy)
